characterInfo.Family: Khal (uncle), Teshav Khal (aunt),  Halam Khal (cousin),  Aratin Khal (cousin),  Meleran Khal (cousin)

characterDescription: Idani was Adolin's first love with whom he became very disappointed when he heard her laughing at Renarin.

characterDetails.Appearance: She was uncommonly well put together for a fourteen-year-old.
characterDetails.Characteristics: She was a cousin to the Khal boys. She was a bit older than Adolin, and  she understood the world better than he did. Adolin had some embarrassment from the interaction with her. She kept talking about how she loved swords, and how she wanted to see Adolin wield his sword. He was fourteen, and he did not understand innuendo, so he bought her a sword. She did not take the gift, so Adolin still keeps that sword.
